root.name: Juggernaut: The New Story For Quake II
root.description: An add-on for Quake 2, with thirteen new levels (single-player and multiplayer), five new monsters and two new weapons.PC RequirementsRegistered version of Quake II™Operating System: Windows® 95 or NT 4.0Processor: Pentium™ 90 MHz or betterMemory: 16 MB RAMVideo Card: Super VGA video cardSound: SoundBlaster or compatible sound cardHard Drive: 25MB available hard drive spaceCD-ROM: 4x CD ROMMiscellaneous: Color monitor
